title: The Serpent and the File.
text: A Serpent in the course of its wanderings came into an armourerâ€™s shop. As he glided over the floor he felt his skin pricked by a file lying there. In a rage he turned round upon it and tried to dart his fangs into it; but he could do no harm to heavy iron and had soon to give over his wrath. It is useless attacking the insensible..
